mapper.select: SELECT P.PJTSEQ, P.PJTNAME, P.PJTSTARTAT, PJTENDAT, PJTPROGRESS FROM USER U JOIN PROJECTMEMBER PM ON U.MAIL = PM.MAIL JOIN PROJECT P ON PM.PJTSEQ = P.PJTSEQ WHERE U.MAIL = #{mail};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT(PJTNAME, PJTSTARTAT, PJTENDAT, PJTPROGRESS) VALUES ( #{pjtName},#{pjtStartAt},#{pjtEndAt},#{pjtProgress} )
INSERT INTO PROJECTMEMBER(PJTSEQ, MAIL) VALUES ((SELECT PJTSEQ FROM PROJECT WHERE PJTNAME=#{pjtName}), #{mail})
mapper.select: SELECT PJTSEQ, PJTNAME, PJTSTARTAT, PJTENDAT, PJTPROGRESS FROM PROJECT WHERE PJTSEQ=#{pjtSeq}
SELECT TASKSEQ, TITLE, PROGRESS, IMPORTANT, STARTAT, ENDAT, MAIL, PJTSEQ FROM TASK WHERE PJTSEQ = #{pjtSeq} ORDER BY TASKSEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TASK (TITLE, MAIL, IMPORTANT, PJTSEQ) VALUES(#{title},#{mail},#{important},#{pjtSeq})
mapper.update: UPDATE TASK SET STARTAT=#{startAt} , ENDAT=#{endAt} , IMPORTANT=#{important} , PROGRESS=#{progress} WHERE TASKSEQ=#{taskSeq}
